attributes.action: Restore the restoration of the death penalty for pre-meditated murder.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We,the undersigned,ask the government to seriously consider the re-introduction of the death penalty as the penalty for a new offence of first-degree(pre-meditated)murder where the guilt of the aacccused is proven beyond all reasonable doubt e.g. DNA evidence,etc.
